lexeme.note: Listed in TYGD as feminine noun.
EDIL: ammatán n o, m. fool, simpleton.

Dwelly: amadan -ain, n pl -ain, & -ana, sm Fool. Cha tuig an t-amadan seo, the fool shall not understand this; nì e amadain, he will make fools. 2 Shaft or connecting rod between the treadle and crank of the driving-wheel, converting reciprocal into circular motion. Illustration see cuidheall-shnìomha. Skye and West of Ross.
